optionContent.option: Allow the dinner to continue and just hope no one will notice the cost of the wine on her expense report.

Allow the dinner to continue because she can’t refuse to pay for the wine without creating an awkward situation. However, she intends to ask for a separate receipt for the wine and pay for it personally.

Speak to Hilde privately before the wait staff prepares the wine and tell her that the cost of the wine won’t be approved by her company. Hilde has the choice to pay for it herself or they can order a more affordable bottle.

incorrect.text: Ingrid pays for the dinner and submits her expense report.

partial.text: Ingrid pays for the dinner and submits her expense report without including the wine.

correct.text: Hilde seems surprised when Ingrid tells her that she can’t pay for the wine. But at the end of the night, she asks for separate checks and pays for it herself.
